heading: HB07806
0: AN ACT GRANTING FILIPINO CITIZENSHIP TO SISTER PATRICIA ANNE THOMPSON FOX
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07806
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING FILIPINO CITIZENSHIP TO SISTER PATRICIA ANNE THOMPSON FOX
ABSTRACT : Grants Philippines citizenship to Sr. Patricia Anne Thompson Fox, who has been living in the country for nearly three decades now, with all the rights, privileges and prerogatives, as well as the duties and obligations appurtenant thereto.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., TINIO, ANTONIO L., DE JESUS, EMMI A., CASTRO, FRANCE L., BROSAS, ARLENE D., CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2018-07-30
